languages.text: "И ты прав{mf||а}. В Экклезиархии полно алчных и властолюбивых грешников. Они забыли, что такое быть пастырем, размякли и раскисли. Души и тела их слишком долго не страдали".

traits.locale_text: "И ты прав{mf||а}. В Экклезиархии полно алчных и властолюбивых грешников. Они забыли, что такое быть пастырем, размякли и раскисли. Души и тела их слишком долго не страдали".

languages.text: "And rightly so. The Ecclesiarchy harbours plenty of covetous and power-hungry recidivists. They've forgotten what it means to be a shepherd. They've grown soft and sluggish. For too long have their souls and bodies gone without suffering."
languages.original_text: "И ты прав{mf||а}. В Экклезиархии полно алчных и властолюбивых грешников. Они забыли, что такое быть пастырем, размякли и раскисли. Души и тела их слишком долго не страдали".

traits.locale_text: "And rightfully so. The Ecclesiarchy harbors plenty of covetous and power-hungry sinners. They've forgotten what it means to be a shepherd, they've grown soft and sluggish. Their souls and bodies haven't suffered for too long."

"And rightfully so. The Ecclesiarchy harbors plenty of covetous and power-hungry sinners. They've forgotten what it means to be a shepherd, they've grown soft and sluggish. Their souls and bodies haven't suffered for too long."

"And rightly so. The Ecclesiarchy harbours plenty of covetous and power-hungry sinners. They've forgotten what it means to be a shepherd. They've grown soft and sluggish. For too long have their souls and bodies gone without suffering."

"And rightly so. The Ecclesiarchy harbours plenty of covetous and power-hungry sinners. They've forgotten what it means to be a shepherd. They've grown soft and sluggish. For too long have their souls and bodies gone without suffering."

"And rightly so. The Ecclesiarchy harbours plenty of covetous and power-hungry recidivists. They've forgotten what it means to be a shepherd. They've grown soft and sluggish. For too long have their souls and bodies gone without suffering."

languages.text: “不相信才是正确的。国教之中隐藏着许许多多渴望权力的贪婪之人。他们已经忘记了身为牧羊人的意义，已经变得软弱、愚钝。他们的灵魂与肉体已经太长时间没有经历过痛苦了。”
languages.original_text: "And rightly so. The Ecclesiarchy harbours plenty of covetous and power-hungry recidivists. They've forgotten what it means to be a shepherd. They've grown soft and sluggish. For too long have their souls and bodies gone without suffering."

traits.locale_text: “不相信才是正确的。国教之中隐藏着许许多多渴望权力的贪婪之人。他们已经忘记了身为牧羊人的意义，已经变得软弱、愚钝。他们的灵魂与肉体已经太长时间没有经历过痛苦了。”

languages.text: «Y con razón. La Eclesiarquía es hogar de numerosos degenerados codiciosos que solo ansían el poder. Han olvidado lo que significa ser pastor; el tiempo los han convertido en débiles e indolentes. Sus almas y cuerpos han pasado demasiado tiempo sin conocer el sufrimiento».
languages.original_text: "And rightly so. The Ecclesiarchy harbours plenty of covetous and power-hungry recidivists. They've forgotten what it means to be a shepherd. They've grown soft and sluggish. For too long have their souls and bodies gone without suffering."

traits.locale_text: «Y con razón. La Eclesiarquía es hogar de numerosos pecadores codiciosos que solo ansían el poder. Han olvidado lo que significa ser pastor; el tiempo los han convertido en débiles e indolentes. Sus almas y cuerpos han pasado demasiado tiempo sin conocer el sufrimiento».

languages.text: 「当然でしょう。帝国聖教会には貪欲で権力に飢えた常習犯が大勢います。彼らは羊飼いとしての役目を忘れてしまい、軟弱で怠惰な存在になり下がりました。あまりにも長い間、魂と肉体が苦しまずに生きてきたために」
languages.original_text: "And rightly so. The Ecclesiarchy harbours plenty of covetous and power-hungry recidivists. They've forgotten what it means to be a shepherd. They've grown soft and sluggish. For too long have their souls and bodies gone without suffering."

traits.locale_text: 「当然でしょう。帝国聖教会には貪欲で権力に飢えた常習犯が大勢います。彼らは羊飼いとしての役目を忘れてしまい、軟弱で怠惰な存在になり下がりました。あまりにも長い間、魂と肉体が苦しまずに生きてきたために」

languages.text: "Und das völlig zu Recht. Die Ekklesiarchie beherbergt zahlreiche habgierige und machthungrige Wiederholungstäter. Sie haben vergessen, was es bedeutet, ein Schäfer zu sein. Sie sind weich und träge geworden. Zu lange haben ihre Seelen und Körper kein Leid erleben müssen."
languages.original_text: "And rightly so. The Ecclesiarchy harbours plenty of covetous and power-hungry recidivists. They've forgotten what it means to be a shepherd. They've grown soft and sluggish. For too long have their souls and bodies gone without suffering."

traits.locale_text: "Und das völlig zu Recht. Die Ekklesiarchie beherbergt zahlreiche habgierige und machthungrige Sünder. Sie haben vergessen, was es bedeutet, ein Schäfer zu sein. Sie sind weich und träge geworden. Zu lange haben ihre Seelen und Körper kein Leid erleben müssen."

languages.text: « Et vous avez raison. On trouve dans les rangs de l'Ecclésiarchie de nombreux récidivistes envieux et affamés de pouvoir, qui ont oublié les prérogatives de leur charge de berger. Ils se sont ramollis en l'absence de souffrance au fil des années, aussi bien au niveau de l'âme que du corps. »
languages.original_text: "And rightly so. The Ecclesiarchy harbours plenty of covetous and power-hungry recidivists. They've forgotten what it means to be a shepherd. They've grown soft and sluggish. For too long have their souls and bodies gone without suffering."

traits.locale_text: « Et vous avez raison. On trouve dans les rangs de l'Ecclésiarchie de nombreux pécheurs envieux et affamés de pouvoir, qui ont oublié les prérogatives de leur charge de berger. Ils se sont ramollis en l'absence de souffrance au fil des années, aussi bien au niveau de l'âme que du corps. »

languages.text: "Haksız da değilsin. Ekleşiarşi, hırslı ve güce aç sayısız suçluya ev sahipliği yapar. Rehberlik etmenin anlamını unuttular. Yumuşadılar ve miskinleştiler. Ruhları ve bedenleri ızdıraba yabancılaşalı çok oldu."
languages.original_text: "And rightly so. The Ecclesiarchy harbours plenty of covetous and power-hungry recidivists. They've forgotten what it means to be a shepherd. They've grown soft and sluggish. For too long have their souls and bodies gone without suffering."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın da. Ekleşiarşi sayısız hırslı, güce aç suçluya ev sahipliği yapar. Bir çoban olmanın ne demek olduğunu unuttular. Yumuşadılar ve miskinleştiler. Ruhları ve bedenleri çok uzun süredir acının ne olduğunu unuttu."
